item.title: H.R. 4170 - Ensuring National Constitutional Rights for Your Private Telecommunications Act of 2019
item.description: Authors: Lieu, Ted and DelBene, Suzan and Jordan, Jim Published: August 2019 URL: https://www.congress.gov/116/bills/hr4170/BILLS-116hr4170ih.pdf Abstract: A Bill To preempt State data security vulnerability manfates and decryption requirements.
